getCommand

public int getCommand(ej.mwt.Widget widget,
                      int x,
                      int y)
Description copied from interface: UpDownRendererContract
Get the command implied by a pointer position of the specified x and y. The returned value should be one of the commands defined in UpDownRendererContract

Specified by:
getCommand in interface UpDownRendererContract
Parameters:
widget - the widget making the enquiry
x - the x position, relative to the widget bounds, of the pointer
y - the y position, relative to the widget bounds, of the pointer
Returns:
the command, or UpDownRendererContract.NO_OP if nothing to do
